__TOC__

The configuration file for setting up keyboard shortcuts in KDE (the default desktop environment for KDE) is found in:

~/.kde/share/apps/kcmkeys

Which is interesting,because that file is not on my Dapper system. Instead, they can be found in

~/.kde/share/config/khotkeysrc
